profile:
The Eavestrough Company has been in business for 16 years and we have more than 60 years of combined experience in the field. This has earned us a superior reputation for quality and professionalism.

We are members of the Better Business Bureau and we have won Best Eavestrough and Siding Company in the Burlington/Oakville area in 2013, 2014, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022. These awards were based on our phenomenal reviews about our outstanding workmanship and client experiences by homeowners who hired us to work on their homes.

The Eavestrough Company serves Burlington, Oakville, Mississauga, Niagara, Cambridge, and Hamilton area installing eavestrough, fascia, soffit, siding and leaf guard systems. Our experience and expertise has earned us one of the best reputations in the Golden Horseshoe area. If you want a job that is done to perfection and at a fair price, give The Eavestrough Company a call today at (905) 966-2564 or visit our website at www.theeavestroughcompany.com

https://www.facebook.com/theeavestroughcompany/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1cDkBnuLFYhmVRcL5gKzqg

profile:
Bros. Roofing has provided high-quality roofing services to Great Toronto and surround area clients since 2002. Bros. Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. 

Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. 

You have a lot to protect under one roof.
We are fully licensed and insured.
We offer a 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship, depending on your selection, add 30-year to lifetime product guarantee.

Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets Bros. Roofing contractors apart.

That is why we offer dependable roofing services and products your family can trust.

If your roof needs repair or replacement, due to age or extreme weather, our experienced team will accurately evaluate its condition, make suitable product suggestions, and provide the skilled craftsmanship needed to ensure a quality job. 
Surprising to many, our high-quality job does not come with a high price tag!
All our services are competitively priced and we provide educational information as well. 

You can count on us:
Most Affordable and Excellenct Roofing Service For You~~

profile:
Landmark Home Solutions have been supplying comfort and peace of mind to homeowners across Ontario since 1987. We’re proud to offer one of the most energy efficient windows available on the market today that offers homeowners a significant return on investment all while being backed with the strongest warranty in the business today!
 
We’re part of the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) and the Better Business Bureau, and in all the years we’ve been in business, we’ve never had an unresolved complaint. We’re members of SAWDAC (Siding and Window Dealers Association of Canada) and make sure that we meet their membership criteria, code of ethics and sign an ironclad five-year workmanship guarantee statement.
 
We’re also proud to say that our windows are Energy Star certified.  As you probably know, the international Energy Star symbol is a simple way for consumers to identify products that are among the most energy-efficient on the market. We also offer financing through TD Canada Trust, ensuring that our customers have a trustworthy partner too.
Based in St. Catharines, Ontario, 

Landmark Home Solutions is proud to represent our Canadian heritage in all that we do.  Our windows are made right here, so you know you’re getting the best quality windows in the world.

profile:
COVID 19 UPDATE: We are open for business and here to assist with all of your roofing needs. Feel free to call, email, message us through the profile and virtual meetings are available. A + Roofing is following all the health and safety percautions as set out by the Province to ensure our employees and customers are safe. 

***

When choosing our company, we guarantee a professional and experienced team member to assess your needs. Our representative will explain how we can help you and offer you an honest and fair quote. Our team of professional roofers is fully insured, and licensed work is stamped with written labour warranty for 10 years; a commitment that truly shows our confidence and credence in our work.

A + Roofing Canada Inc. provides quality and professional service around GTA and its surroundings. Feel free to contact us for more information

A + Roofing has an ever-expanding list of building products, including roofing products for residential, flat, and commercial roofs, lumber, moldings, doors, replacement windows, vinyl siding so many other products that we have everything necessary to complete every project on your list.

A + Roofing is a true mom-and-pop store started as a small distributor of commercial roofing products in the backyard of its president's home. Ever since, we've been expanding, thanks to our loyal customers.

profile:
Gutter Force was started in an observation that eavestrough cleaning was a hazardous job that if done differently could make it safer and avoid people falling off ladders and seriously hurting themselves.

We have evolved into a unique specialized home service company in eavestroughing . We have three primary services that we provide; Eavestrough repair ,eavestrough replacement or installation,  Aluminum Soffit and fascia exterior makeovers.

Gutter Force is under professional management by team of experts is knowledgeable,skilled and dedicated. We pride ourselves in excellent customer satisfaction.


Gutter Force offer eavestrough installation and repair as well as gutter and downpipe repair or replacement,downspout disconnection, soffit and fascia installation, ice dam removal and more in Toronto and area.

profile:
Welcome!

Baz Aluminum has a proven record of excellence in designing and managing several building and construction projects in the GTA. No matter the size of your project, the experienced professionals at Baz Aluminum will plan, design, construct, and maintain your project.
You'll Be Glad You Chose Us
Effective planning is crucial to the successful completion of any project. Before starting the project, our team of experts will first assess your goals. Then we provide you with an estimate and time-line for completion. From beginning to end you will be involved every step of the way.
Cost-Effective Services
Eliminate all the items on your to-do list by calling the experts at Baz Aluminum. You'll be glad you did. We have many years of experience and work hard to make sure the job is done right while saving you time, money, and aggravation. We'll be there whenever you need us.
Call us today to get your project underway

profile:
Leafguard is available in Canada

Trades by Jack is proud to offer this fantastic product to help you. Avoid the messy work involved in dealing with your gutters and eavestroughs.

Say goodbye to the dangerous and unpleasant job of climbing up to your roof to clean out your gutters once and for all, without the expense of paying someone else to do it.

Gutters capture the rainwater from your roof and carry it safely to the ground, away from your foundation, where it can cause serious damage. Ordinary gutters capture leaves, twigs and other organic debris that causes them to clog and overflow during rainstorms.

 •LeafGuard’s patented design causes rainwater to flow around its curved hood and into the gutter, keeping leaves and debris out.
 •LeafGuard Brand Gutters are guaranteed not to clog for as long as you own your home, or Gutter Depot will clean your gutters for free.
 •LeafGuard Gutters are made to fit any home in a variety of colours. Best of all they are made out durable materials, designed to last as long as you have a roof.
 
 Call Us for Free Estimate!


Service Areas: Ajax, Aurora, Bolton, Brampton, Burlington, Etobicoke, Markham, Mississauga, Newmarket, North York, Maple, Oakville, Oshawa, Pickering, Scarborough, Thornhill, Richmond Hill, Toronto, Vaughan, Whitby, Woodbridge & Beyond!


Contact Details

Address: 5132 Timberlea Blvd.
Mississauga, Ontario, L4W 2S5
Phone: (289) 271-0636
Email: info@tradesbyjack.ca


Why Trades by Jack?

Trades by Jack can help you say goodbye, permanently, to the dangerous and distressing job of clearing out your rain gutters –without having to pay someone else to do it.

profile:
We Provide Professional Home Exterior Services

Serving Toronto and GTA, Kresic Aluminum is one of Ontario's best home exterior service providers. For over 5 years and 5,000 projects our friendly technicians have been getting the job done right - and it's always guaranteed! We proudly offer a 5-year guarantee on installations and 2-year guarantee on repairs. You can trust us to care for your property like it is our own!
products:
For gutter seals we use best on market Kop-R-Lastic® Sealant wich is a one-part, highly elastic, high-performance thermoplastic sealant. The sealant exhibits excellent adhesion to a variety of construction materials. It can be applied to wet or dry surfaces and has excellent low temperature flexibility
For every aluminum installation we use matching colored screws
We also use multiple aluminum and siding supliers such as KAYCAN Ltd., GENTEK, etc.

profile:
Gateway Roofing & Contracting Ltd is dedicated to providing the best service and they do everything they can to make sure you are completely satisfied with the work provided. Using the latest industry-approved practices to reinforce vulnerable and weak areas so your home is protected long after the work is done. 
 
Asphalt shingles may be their specialty but they are also experienced in eavestrough, soffit, fascia, siding, attic insulation & venting, skylights and much more. A harsh climate, bad architectural design, inadequate roof ventilation and lack of insulation can disrupt the function of your home causing roofing and waterproofing products to break down prematurely. They will identify these issues, educate you with a proper solution and provide a written estimate.

profile:
We are a renovation and construction company focused of on the important details of any job.  Whether we are laying one room of hardwood or building you a brand new house attention to how it is done and built so that it lasts is what we do.

Our team of experienced professionals are experts in what they do and know how to effectively apply their skills, workmanship and customer service excellence to assist you with your needs. Our knowledgeable staff is dependable, reliability and excel at offering personal service to all our customers.

Experts in Roofing, Siding, Gutters and Eavestroughs as well as Whole Home Renovations, Decks, Fences and Gates. Have a commercial property needing attending to? We are here for you as well!

Our company mission is to provide quality products and services at competitive rates. We are industry professionals and we are committed to listening to our customers to address your needs. We do it right the first time – we guarantee it.

We contribute our continued growth over the years to the quality of our workmanship, our selection of services and affordable rates. We take pride in the solid customer relationships we have built; our longevity in the industry is testament to our commitment to our customers.

Look forward to hearing from you!
specialities: All types of siding, roofing gutters as well as eavestroughs for both residential and commercial properties. Yes, we are pros!

profile:
Our company has over 6 years of experience and our technicians are some of the best around. As a company that’s been in existence for over three decades, we’ve had the pleasure and privilege of serving our community through the years, and we’ve built a strong customer base in that time. Many of our customers are repeat customers, and they trust us to service their gutters with our expertise and skill.

Whether you need a gutter installed, cleaned, or repaired, we’re here to help. All you need to do is give us a call and we’ll take care of the rest.

Why Wouldn’t You?
We focus 100% on gutter cleaning, gutter installation and repair. If you have improperly installed gutters, your home is in jeopardy! This is especially true in four season states. Rains will bring water back to your home. As a result it brings rot damage to exterior doors and windows, and other wood. This can cause extensive damage and repair work. The water can also damage landscaping and your foundation. It doesn’t stop there, clogged gutters and drains are just as serious for your home. A blocked gutter passage will send water where it doesn’t belong. In fact, a dirty gutter is worse than no gutters at all! If you’re unsure of the quality and state of your gutters, please contact Gutter Rescue. We want to help you keep your largest asset safe… your home.
